comment: What have you DONE and why?? I used this app frequently now I miss some of the features even before a history was listed down now you have to stop writing and hit a button that brings you to another window. To many clicks for a simple translation, history was all listed in one screen during writing. Not my favourite anymore!
scenarios: Previously, a history of translations was listed down automatically during writing, allowing for easy reference without additional actions.
Now, users have to stop writing and hit a button that brings them to another window to access translation history, requiring too many clicks for a simple translation.
key sentence: Now, users have to stop writing and hit a button that brings them to another window to access translation history, requiring too many clicks for a simple translation.
the function of activity: The setting of 'Tap to Translate','Data usage','keyboard','voice region','voice speed','voice speech input'.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'More Options', 'description': "Open additional options by clicking the 'More options' icon."}, {'name': 'Manage Activity', 'description': "Manage your translation history by clicking the 'Manage activity' button."}, {'name': 'Tap to Translate Setting', 'description': "The setting of 'Tap to Translate' feature."}, {'name': 'Data Usage Setting', 'description': 'Configure data usage settings by selecting this option.'}, {'name': 'Keyboard Settings', 'description': 'Adjust keyboard settings by selecting this option.'}, {'name': 'Voice Settings', 'description': 'Adjust voice settings by selecting this option.'}, {'name': 'Voice Region Settings', 'description': 'Configure voice region settings by selecting this option.'}, {'name': 'Voice Speed Settings', 'description': 'Adjust translation or speech speed settings by selecting this option.'}, {'name': 'Voice Speech Input', 'description': 'Configure voice speech input settings by selecting this option.'}, {'name': 'Version Info', 'description': 'View the version information of the application.'}]
